Class BitMap.Builder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.raistlic.common.adt.BitMap.Builder

    BitMap

    public static class BitMap.Builder
extends java.lang.Object
implements ObjectBuilder<BitMap>
    The builder to create new bit map instances.
